Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Name: Goblet
Description: Goblet with a small flat base, slightly flared mouth and simple lip. The surface is coloured red-brown, with large black patches, and preserves remains of a red slip that covered the whole of the exterior and the upper section of the interior. Traces demonstrate that those sections were horizontally burnished. The base of the vessel is slightly convex.
